title: Flowers, Butterflies and Insects: All 154 Engravings from "Erucarum Ortus"
description: Fine-line images of roses, butterflies, tulips, caterpillars, and other specimens of plant and insect life in elegant full-page compositions. These plates are considered among the finest achievements of a great age of floral painting and the engraver's art. Reprinted from the classic, influential works of the famed artist/entomologist Merian (1647â€“1717). New English captions.
author: Maria Sibylla Merian
